contentrichtext.text: <!-- Deleted image removed: [[image:HarrisBlake.JPG|thumb|right|Sen. Harris Blake]] --> '''Harris Blake''' is a [[United States Republican Party|Republican]] member of the [[North Carolina General Assembly]] representing the state's twenty-second Senate district, which includes constituents in [[Harnett County, North Carolina|Harnett]], [[Lee County, North Carolina|Lee]] and [[Moore County, North Carolina|Moore]] counties. Blake is a [[real estate agent]] from [[Pinehurst, North Carolina]].<ref>{{citation|url=http://www.ncga.state.nc.us/gascripts/members/viewMember.pl?nUserID=118&sChamber=S |title=Senator Harris Blake (Rep) |publisher=General Assembly of North Carolina}}</ref><ref>{{citation|title=Health care reform plan uncertain after midterm|author=Viviana Bonilla Lopez |date=November 11, 2010| url=http://www.dailytarheel.com/index.php/article/2010/11/health_care_reform_plan_uncertain_after_midterm|publisher=The Daily Tar Heel}} </ref> ==References== {{Reflist}} {{North Carolina State Senators}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME =Blake, Harris | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = American politician | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Blake, Harris}} [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:North Carolina State Senators]] [[Category:Year of birth missing (living people)]] {{NorthCarolina-politician-stub}}
